title: Calibrated SoilOptix ® estimates of soil pH and exchangeable cations in three agricultural fields in western Canada – implications for managing spatially variable soil acidity
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Rebecca Oiza Enesi, Miles F. Dyck, Malinda S. Thilakarathna, Stephen E. Strelkov, Linda Yuya Gorim
